channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for KS

item.title: Report X-2024051538
item.description:
Report X-2024051538

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-07T18:15:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-20
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER RESPONDED TO A LEAKING PACKAGE IN THE UNLOAD WITH FULL PPE ON. USING THE DECISION TREE THE RESPONDER CLEANED UP THE LEAKING PACKAGE AND PLACED ALL MATERIAL IN A LINED SPILL TUB. THE RESPONDER TRANSPORTED THE MATERIAL TO DMP FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. UPON ARRIVAL RESPONDER NOTED THAT ONE 2.5 LITER BOTTLE WAS LEAKING FROM THE CAP. ALL MATERIAL WAS DISPOSED OF THROUGH DMP.

  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED OUT FOR A LEAKING PACKAGE. RESPONDER BROUGHT LEAKING PACKAGE BACK TO DMP AREA FOR EVALUATION. UPON INSPECTION, IT WAS NOTICED THAT ONE OF THE CONTAINER LIDS WAS CRACKED.

item.title: Report X-2024051135
item.description:
Report X-2024051135

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-05T15:12:36+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-14
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER RESPONDED TO A LEAKING PACKAGE IN THE UNLOAD WITH FULL PPE ON. USING THE DECISION TREE THE RESPONDER CLEANED UP THE LEAKING PACKAGE AND PLACED ALL MATERIAL IN A LINED SPILL TUB. THE RESPONDER TRANSPORTED THE LEAKING PACKAGE TO DMP FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. UPON ARIVAL RESPONDER NOTED THE TWO 2.5 GALLONS BOTTLES HAD LOOSE SEAL AND WAS LEAKING FROM THE CAPS. NO PACKING MATERIAL AROUND BOTTLES. ALL MATERIAL WAS DISPOSED OF THOUGH DMP.

item.title: Report X-2024051118
item.description:
Report X-2024051118

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-05T15:12:36+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-13
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SUPERVISOR CALLED IN A LEAKING PACKAGE TO THE DMP. DMP DISPATCHED A RESPONDER WITH FULL PPE AND SPILL CART. RESPONDER ARRIVED ON SCENE AND FOUND THE LEAKING PACKAGE. RESPONDER CONSULTED WITH THE DECSION TREE ON HOW TO PROCEED WITH THE CLEANUP. RESPONDER CLEANED UP THE SPILL FOLLOWING GUIDLINES IN THE DECSION TREE. RESPONDER BROUGHT BACK THE LEAKER TO DMP FOR PROPER DISPOSAL. PACKAGE WAS DISPOSED OF.

item.title: Report X-2024051117
item.description:
Report X-2024051117

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-05T15:12:36+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-13
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: OUTBOUND SUP CALLED IN A LEAKER TO THE DMP. DMP DISPATCHED A RESPONDER WITH FULL PPE AND SPILL CART. RESPONDER ARRIVED ON SCENE AND FOUND THE LEAKER. RESPONDER CONSULTED THE DECISON TREE ON HOW TO PROCEED WITH THE CLEANUP. RESPONDER CORRECTLY FOLLOWED GUIDELINES IN DECSION TREE AND CLEANED UP THE SPILL. BROUGHT BACK LEAKING PACKAGE TO DMP FOR PROPER DISPOSAL.
